tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_fields (
    field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    season VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    yield DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    productivity DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE seasons (
  season_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  season_name VARCHAR(50),
  year INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE crop_yields (
  yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  season_id INT,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50),
  yield_amount INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(field_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (season_id) REFERENCES seasons(season_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Season (season_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
season_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
start_date DATE NOT NULL,
end_date DATE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Yield (yield_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
field_id UUID NOT NULL,
season_id UUID NOT NULL,
crop_id UUID NOT NULL,
yield_amount FLOAT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Productivity (productivity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
field_id UUID NOT NULL,
season_id UUID NOT NULL,
crop_id UUID NOT NULL,
productivity_score INT NOT NULL);
